attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! if you get the app it will send out a donald trump revenge turtle on you!!! im serious! i was expecting a fluffy blue turtle when all of the sudden im dodging like its mario cart! after it destroyed my house and left me completely homeless, it then took my dog and car. donald trump revenge turtle stole my car, dog, home, and destroyed my life! do not get this app 😔

attributes.title: Pictures of naked trump on the app
attributes.review: When i was intrigued about the current 2020  elections I wanted to be very involved and informed on the elections but when I opened this app o saw a picture of naked trump and I really don’t not appreciate that and that picture could be seen by younger kids which I don’t approve

attributes.title: Horrible app from a HORRIBLE PERSON
attributes.review:
donald trump (he ain’t deserve capital) is trying to remove my beloved TikTok from the App Store and get it banned in the US. ABSOLUTELY NOT who does he think he is?? You attempt to remove TikTok, we actually remove your app🥰💖😳 it was probably trash anyway, just like you💛🧚🏼‍♀️✨ 
                                  -Gen Z

attributes.title: WORST APP TO EXIST
attributes.review: IMMEDIATELY DELETED. This app showed horrifying HORRIFYING pictures of this fat orange worm wriggling around in spray tan making it a horrendous neon orange. THEN my goldfish of 69 years was lifted out of its tank with demonic possession and started chanting trump 2020. Soon after my pet rock was smashed into millions of pieces by an unknown force while trump 2020 rang in my ears. I am SUFFERING from hearing loss. Never NEVER download this app.

attributes.title: Unfathomably awful
attributes.review: I was surprised to see that when I first opened this app, there were nude photos of Donald Frump. My children have access to my phone and if they were to see such a thing I would have to send them to therapy. Frankly I may need therapy myself. Inappropriate!!

attributes.title: Disgusting. I’m going to bleach my eyeballs
attributes.review:
I opened the app to find a gross sweaty old, moldy Cheeto.
I was then harassed by the Cheeto’s cult members and was forced to wear their hideous clothing after that one of them told me to kill myself, honestly I’ve been crying for the past hour. I know this app is filled with awful, racist, old people, but wow. Was I amazed.

attributes.title: Actually stinks
attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app because I was curious. I downloaded it no problem. Then an hour later I smell like rotten grapes and sour milk started emitting from my phone. I was so confused. I discovered when I opened the app it got 3x worse! Totally rotten app, literally. Don’t recommend.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I wish I could give a negative amount of stars first if all its completely unorganized and the colors are ugly. Also when you open the app there’s a big ugly man on the front and it almost made me puke. Besides that I did not enjoy or see purpose in this app.

attributes.title: no bueno/no good
attributes.review: this app brings back memories I don’t want to remember mostly the picture where I saw donald trump small cheeto all over my timeline you don’t know how bad I wanted to bleach my eyes in that certain moment but let’s🤩get✌️those👄cootter🐱bones😫on👀fleek🐳ladies😌sir😗I’m👁not😦sure😉why🧤your📟here🎇but🚆let’s🚁take🧩it￼🏋️‍♂️lower🧜

attributes.title: No cheetos in office
attributes.review:
For starters BIDEN 2020!!!!! I hope never to see a cheeto in the office EVER again! Black lives MATTER!!! Woman’s rights are human RIGHTS!! Abortion is LEGAL!! Pride 🏳️‍🌈!!!            I HOPE THE TRUMP FAMILY CAN FIND BRAINS, understand that we all miss the obamas,  I will literally barf if trump becomes president again. Let’s hope America will come to our senses and not have a CHEETO FOR PRESIDENT! 

An American with a brain,
Bryonca Hills
